Articles.Content:
So who do I send my money to? This is a fun game. I am very much looking forward to the future updates.

Anyway just checking in. Now I'm off to search for other people's rockets and read some forum posts.

I've managed to get to almost 400k meters, but haven't put myself into orbit yet and am having trouble with stability and maneuverability at altitude. Not looking for answers here, since I've not yet read any posts.

Cheers,

- McGrude

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
